metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Uptown Girl is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Uptown Girl has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Major, C Major, A Major,  and B Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
